column5: Entertainer home with upscale furniture (3400 sq ft). Large flat screen TV's throughout the home. Upstairs has large media room w/full walk in bar, dart board, poker table, game cabinet & wine fridge. 3 bedrooms/ 2 bath upstairs and downstairs master with master bath including jacuzzi tub. Large backyard w/pool, jacuzzi. Stainless kitchen including double oven, warming drawer, dishwasher, 3 refrigerators, and full access to chafing dishes. Full gym of professional Natilus equipment in garage.
